revised_title: Optimal Subdivision of Merchant Ships to Minimize Losses
tldr: The authors analyze the probability of losing bulkheads and the subsequent effect on the chances of a ship sinking due to torpedo attacks. They determine the optimal spacing of bulkheads to maximize protection while minimizing the impact on loading and unloading efficiency. The study focuses on cargo steamers and considers the type of vessel, freeboard, permeability, and floodable length.
